title: Grilled salmon salad
ingredients: ['8 cardamom pods, crushed', '1 tsp cumin seeds', 'finely grated zest and juice of 1 lime', 'juice of 1 large orange', '1 tbsp light soy sauce', '1 tbsp clear honey', '4 pieces of skinless salmon fillet, about 115 g (4 oz) each', '150 g (5½ oz) mixed colourful salad leaves, such as Lollo Rosso, Oak Leaf lettuce and baby red chard', '1 mango, peeled and cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '1 papaya, peeled, seeded and cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '1 orange, peeled and segmented', 'salt and pepper']
